name: LogTrackFilesystemViews
description:
Log a new view for file system access tracking.

Use this tool to log a new view every time a file system resource is accessed via GET, helping track file system views for monitoring or analytics purposes.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Call /api/projects/ to obtain it.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Specify the format of the response. Valid options are 'csv' or 'json'.

parameters.name: filesystem_view_data
parameters.description: The JSON payload containing details like id, name, description, tags, and more to log a new filesystem view. Include optional settings for Slack notifications and calculation status.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object
